_description: Three lines advocating caution (including ‘had y wyst’)

BLHar665.Transcription: Say well or be styllSuffyr and haue all thy wyllKnow or þou trystAnd be ware of hady wyst

PierpontB21.Transcription:
Sey þe best or be stylleWyth thy tonge noman thou
                    qwelleSuffyr and haue thy wylle
PierpontB21.Note:
hree lines translating four short Latin lines, beg. ‘Optimam dic
                    ve tacere…’.
